text: Mason "Racin'" Barbera (born 10 November 1997 in Bundaberg) is a racing driver from Australia. He previously competeted in the Dunlop Super2 Series for Garry Rogers Motorsport. ==Career results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! Season ! Series ! Position ! Car !
